member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.SchedulerLicenseKey
member.summary:
License key for the scheduler plug-in.
See .
member.remarks: Use "GPL-My-Project-Is-Open-Source" for GPL projects, or "CC-Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives" for non commercial projects.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.ThemeSystem
member.summary: Determines the theme system used by the calendar.

remarks.para: The ThemeSystem property can be one of these values:

item.description: Supports Bootstrap 3 themes.The Bootstrap CSS file must be loaded separately in its own link tag.
Supports jQuery UI themes. The jQuery UI CSS file must be loaded separately loaded in its own link tag.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.TodayDate
member.summary: Returns or sets the value that is used by as today's date.
member.returns: A representing today's date. The default value is the current system date.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.CurrentDate
member.summary: Returns or sets the current value that is used by the to display the current view.
member.returns: A representing the currently displayed date/time. The default is the current system time.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.MinTime
member.summary: Determines the starting time that will be displayed, even when the scrollbars have been scrolled all the way up.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.MaxTime
member.summary: Determines the end time (exclusively) that will be displayed, even when the scrollbars have been scrolled all the way down.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.ScrollTime
member.summary: Determines how far down the scroll pane is initially scrolled down.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.SlotLabelInterval
member.summary: Determines how often the time-axis is labeled with text displaying the date/time of slots..
member.remarks: If not specified, this value is automatically computed from slotDuration. With slotDuration's default value of 30 minutes, this value will be 1 hour.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.SlotDuration
member.summary: Determines the frequency for displaying time slots.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.NextDayThreshold
member.summary: Determines the next-day threshold time.

remarks.para: When an event's end time spans into another day, this is the minimum time it must be in order for it to render as if it were on that day.
Only affects timed events that appear on whole-days. Whole-day cells occur in month view, basicDay, basicWeek and the all-day slots in the agenda views.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.SlotLabelFormat
member.summary: Determines the time-text that will be displayed on the vertical axis of the agenda views using momentjs format patterns: http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.HeaderFormats
member.summary: Determines the formatting of the column headers in the different views using momentjs format patterns: http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek
member.summary: Returns or sets the first day of the week as displayed in the FullCalendar.
member.returns: One of the values. The default is .

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.BusinessHours
member.summary: Emphasizes certain time slots on the calendar. By default, Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.EventLimit
member.summary: Limits the number of events displayed on a day.
member.remarks: When there are too many events, a link that looks like "+2 more" is displayed. The exact action that happens when the user clicks the link is determined by .

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.VirtualMode
member.summary: Returns or sets whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the control.
member.returns: true if the uses data-management operations that you provide; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.VirtualSize
member.summary: Returns or sets the number of objects contained in the list when in virtual mode.
member.returns: The number of objects contained in the when in virtual mode.
member.exception: is set to a value less than 0.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.Editable
member.summary: Determines whether the events on the calendar can be modified.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.NoEventsMessage
member.summary: Returns or sets the message to display in one of the list views when there are no events to display.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.DefaultNoEventsMessage
member.summary: Returns the default message to display in one if the list views when there are no events.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.AllDayText
member.summary: Returns or sets the text titling the "all-day" slot at the top of the calendar.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.DefaultAllDayText
member.summary: Returns the default The text titling the "all-day" slot at the top of the calendar.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.ShowCurrentTime
member.summary: Determines whether or not to display a marker indicating the current time.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.AllDaySlot

member.summary: Determines if timed events in agenda view should visually overlap.

member.summary: Sets the background color for all events in the calendar.

member.summary: Sets the border color for all events on the calendar.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.Resources
member.summary: Returns or sets the scheduler resources. Requires the to be set to a valid license or to a GPL or CC license.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.ResourceLabelText
member.summary: Returns or sets the text that will appear above the list of resources. Requires the to be set to a valid license or to a GPL or CC license.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.ResourceAreaWidth
member.summary: Determines the width of the area that contains the list of resources. Requires the to be set to a valid license or to a GPL or CC license.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.InitScript
member.summary: Overridden to create our initialization script.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.Previous
member.summary: Moves the calendar one step back (either by a month, week, or day).
member.remarks: If the calendar is in month view, will move the calendar back one month. If the calendar is in basicWeek or agendaWeek, will move the calendar back one week. If the calendar is in basicDay or agendaDay, will move the calendar back one day.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.Next
member.summary: Moves the calendar one step forward (either by a month, week, or day).
member.remarks: If the calendar is in month view, will move the calendar forward one month. If the calendar is in basicWeek or agendaWeek, will move the calendar forward one week. If the calendar is in basicDay or agendaDay, will move the calendar forward one day.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.PreviousYear
member.summary: Moves the calendar back one year.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.NextYear
member.summary: Moves the calendar forward one year.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.Today
member.summary: Moves the calendar to the current date.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.FullCalendar.GotoDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Moves the calendar to an arbitrary date.
member.param: The date to set the calendar view to.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType
member.summary: Enumerates the different "views", or ways of displaying days and events.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.Month
member.summary: Shows the events in a monthly calendar view.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.BasicWeek
member.summary: Shows the events in a simple weekly view.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.BasicDay
member.summary: Shows the events in a single day view.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.AgendaWeek
member.summary: Shows the events in a weekly view with time slots.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.AgendaDay
member.summary: Shows the events in a single day view with time slots.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.ListYear
member.summary: Displays all the events in a year in a flat list. If there are no events during a specific interval of time, the string is displayed.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.ListMonth
member.summary: Displays all the events in a month in a flat list. If there are no events during a specific interval of time, the string is displayed.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.ListWeek
member.summary: Displays all the events in a week in a flat list. If there are no events during a specific interval of time, the string is displayed.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.ListDay
member.summary: Displays all the events in a day in a flat list. If there are no events during a specific interval of time, the string is displayed.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.TimelineDay
member.summary: Shows a customizable horizontal time-axis and resources as rows. This is part of the scheduler commercial plug-in.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.TimelineWeek
member.summary: Shows a customizable horizontal time-axis and resources as rows. This is part of the scheduler commercial plug-in.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.TimelineMonth
member.summary: Shows a customizable horizontal time-axis and resources as rows. This is part of the scheduler commercial plug-in.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.FullCalendar.ViewType.TimelineYear
member.summary: Shows a customizable horizontal time-axis and resources as rows. This is part of the scheduler commercial plug-in.
